Dr. Robert Oexman, a sleep researcher, founder and CEO of Somly and “@thesleepprofessor” on TikTok contributed his expert insights to this story to help us select products and assemble the shopping guide. We periodically fact-check our articles to keep them relevant and make sure our recommended products are still in stock. This piece was last reviewed in July 2024. How We Chose The Best Cooling Mattress Protectors To find the best cooling mattress protectors, we sought out options from trusted brands, consulted with an expert and took the reviews of real customers into account. We leaned into the guidance we received from Oexman, who shared breathable and cooling mattress protectors he recommends. We also sought out highly rated products from respected and reputable brands. However, you may notice that some of these mattress protectors have mixed reviews and fairly low overall ratings. In order for mattress protectors to do their job effectively, they can’t be completely breathable or airy. If they’re highly breathable, they may not be completely water-resistant—and vice versa. By their very nature, even the best mattress protectors also tend to be noisy, crinkly, plasticky and slippery—not exactly a recipe for comfort or glowing ratings. Finally, we chose mattress protectors at a few different price points to make sure there was one to fit every budget. We also included a kids’ option—since children are arguably the demographic that most needs a mattress protector. What To Consider When Shopping For The Best Cooling Mattress Protectors Ready to shop? Here are a few key factors to consider when choosing the best cooling mattress protector for your (or your child’s) mattress. Materials Most cooling mattress protectors are made from polyethylene (PE) or polyurethane (PU). Both materials are lightweight, don’t trap heat, can wick away moisture and feel cool to the touch. These qualities make them ideal for mattress protectors. Cooling Technology There have been many advancements in cooling technology for mattresses and sheets, like temperature-regulating gel foams and phase change materials that dissipate your body heat. However, cooling mattress protectors have remained fairly simple. They are usually made with PE or PU that is designed to optimize breathability and water-resistance. The addition of extra materials could hinder their performance or make them too thick and padded. For additional cooling without adding a lot of extra bulk to your bed, Oexman recommends harnessing the cooling power of air or water. You can do this with a high-tech bed cooling system. Encasement Style There are two major types of mattress protectors. Standard mattress protectors go on your mattress like a fitted sheet. They don’t provide wraparound protection, but they’re very easy to put on and take off. Mattress encasements, on the other hand, are protectors that wrap entirely around the mattress and zip closed. They provide better protection against dirt, dust and allergens, but are a bit more cumbersome. All of the mattress protectors we feature above are the fitted-sheet style. However, if you’re looking for more protection against dust and allergens, you may want to consider a mattress encasement. Care One of the biggest benefits of mattress protectors is that they can be easily thrown in the wash, while your mattress can’t. Most mattress protectors can be machine-washed and dried, but it’s important to double-check the care instructions before you purchase—especially since some of these cooling protectors are made with specialty materials. What Is The Best Material For A Mattress Protector To Keep Cool? Most cooling mattress protectors are made from polyethylene or polyurethane. These materials lend mattress protectors a balance of waterproofing and cooling. Do Cooling Mattresses Work In A Mattress Protector? Mattress protectors are designed to keep water and other fluids from reaching your mattress. This has to limit breathability to some degree in order to provide fluid resistance. Oexman says, “A good passive cooling mattress can be limited if the mattress protector you use does not allow for air to move through from person to mattress or mattress to person.” Fortunately, most cooling protectors are made with polyethylene, which does a good job at allowing heat to pass through it as opposed to collecting. What Is The Best Mattress Protector For Someone Who Sweats? The best mattress protectors for people who sweat at night need to be breathable and cooling. For the most part, these protectors are made out of polyethylene or polyurethane, which pull heat away from the body, but still provide fluid resistance. SaVanna Shoemaker Following Editorial Standards Print Reprints & Permissions
news.summary: The best cooling mattress protectors strike a balance between breathability and water-resistance. Our top picks are from Brooklyn Bedding, Bedgear, Sleep Number and more.
news.author: Contributor,Savanna Shoemaker

news.title: Best Cooling Mattresses 2024 | Reviewed By Sleep Experts - Forbes Vetted
news.text: Share to Facebook Share to Twitter Share to Linkedin If kicking the covers off, shedding clothing and sweating through your sheets has become part of your nightly routine, it’s time to consider a cooling mattress. The Brooklyn Bedding Aurora is one of the best cooling mattresses that help you sleep a few degrees cooler using a combination of breathable construction and active cooling features, while also supporting proper spinal alignment and providing full-body comfort. The Brooklyn Bedding Aurora Luxe is the best cooling mattress for its active cooling features and ... [+] cool-to-the-touch cover. ILLUSTRATION: FORBES / PHOTO: RETAILER But maybe the Aurora Luxe isn’t what you’re looking for—no problem. We’ve included 11 other worthy contenders that deliver cooling comfort along with other specialties like certified organic materials or smart features that respond to your body temperature. Every mattress on this list has been tested by one of our sleep experts so we can personally vouch for their cooling abilities and overall performance. Best Cooling Mattress Overall: Brooklyn Bedding Aurora Luxe (Queen) Best Cooling Mattress For Side Sleepers: Helix Midnight Luxe Mattress With GlacioTex Cover (Queen) Best Cooling Mattress For Stomach Sleepers: Leesa Legend Chill Hybrid Mattress (Queen) Best Organic Cooling Mattress: Avocado Green Mattress (Queen) Best Cooling Hybrid Mattress: Purple RestorePremier Hybrid (Queen) Best Cooling Mattress For Back Pain: Saatva Classic (Queen) Best Cooling Mattress For Couples: The DreamCloud (Queen) Best Cooling Memory Foam Mattress: GhostBed Luxe (Queen) Best Luxury Cooling Mattress: Sleep Number Climate360 (Queen) Best Affordable Cooling Memory Foam Mattress: Cocoon Chill Mattress (Queen) Best Firm Cooling Mattress: Tempur-Breeze LuxeBreeze (Queen) Best Cooling Mattress For Pressure Relief: Casper Snow (Queen) Best Cooling Mattress Overall A Cozy Luxury Mattress That's A Real Crowd-Pleaser MOST POPULAR Brooklyn Bedding Brooklyn Bedding Aurora Luxe (Queen) Type: Hybrid | Materials: Wrapped coils, foam, optional pillow top | Firmness level: Soft (3), medium (5) or firm (7) | Trial period: 120 nights | Warranty: 10 years What you’ll love: Remarkable cooling prowess Three comfort levels with optional pillow top RV and non-traditional sizes available Keep in mind: GlacioTex cover may be a tad slippery Returns cost $99 In our experience, the Brooklyn Bedding Aurora Luxe is the best mattress for most sleepers seeking cooling relief. It’s wrapped in a specialty cover made of fibers that draw heat away from your body; it exudes a slick surface that’s soothing upon first contact. There are also layers of gel and copper-infused foams designed to regulate your temperature, along with a support core of up to 1,032 individually wrapped coils for plenty of airflow. With three firmness levels and a broader range of sizes than most sleep brands offer, you should have little trouble finding the right fit for your sleep preferences and space. (A 120-night trial is included, but you’re on the hook for a $99 fee if you return it.) If you crave a little extra plushness, add a 2-inch foam pillow top for up to $300 more. What our experts say: Senior sleep editor Bridget Chapman slept on a medium Aurora Luxe with a pillow top for several months. This was her main takeaway: “The Aurora Luxe is a really nice luxury cooling mattress. It’s a major benefit that it comes in three different firmness levels, so different sleepers can pick the right one for them. Its plush, lifted feel reminds me of a high-end hotel mattress, and I was really impressed by its ability to prevent me from overheating, isolate motion and keep me and my partner well supported.” Read more in her Brooklyn Bedding Aurora Luxe Mattress review. The 2024 Forbes Vetted Best Product Awards are here: Explore our 150 top-recommended items across categories after extensive research and testing. Best Cooling Mattress For Side Sleepers Side Sleepers Won't Break A Sweat On This Balanced Hybrid Helix Sleep Helix Midnight Luxe Mattress With GlacioTex Cover (Queen) Type: Hybrid | Materials: Foam and wrapped coils | Firmness level: Medium (5 to 6) | Trial period: 100 nights | Warranty: 15 years What you’ll love: Balanced feel for side, back and combo sleepers GlacioTex cover is effective at keeping sleepers cool Enhanced lumbar support helps alleviate pain Keep in mind: Stomach sleepers may find it too soft; check out the Dawn Luxe instead Lacks the sink-in sensation of an all-foam bed The Helix Midnight Luxe sandwiches its foam layers between a quilted top and a wrapped-coil layer where air can travel between the metal springs. The medium feel of the Midnight Luxe should appeal to most people, but we also consider it the best mattress for side sleepers for its mix of back-aligning support with ample pressure relief along the hips and shoulders. Many back sleepers should also appreciate its balanced feel and back pain sufferers benefit from the enhanced lumbar support. The mattress comes with a moisture-wicking Tencel fabric cover, but you can pay extra for a GlacioTex cover woven with thermal conductive fibers to draw heat away from your body for heavy-duty cooling. What our experts say: In her Helix Midnight Luxe review, updates writer Alexandra Garrett calls this mattress “comfortable, supportive and so cool.” (Her test model had a GlacioTex cover.) She adds, “Side sleepers, back sleepers and back pain sufferers should appreciate the bed’s excellent pressure relief and support. Hot sleepers can keep cool with the mattress’ GlacioTex cover and breathable hybrid construction, and combination sleepers can benefit from its slight bounce and lifted feel.” Best Cooling Mattress For Stomach Sleepers Cooling Comfort No Matter How You Choose To Snooze Leesa Leesa Legend Chill Hybrid Mattress (Queen) Type: Hybrid | Materials: Foam, coils, microcoils, cooling cover | Firmness Level: Medium-firm (5 to 7) |Trial Period: 100 nights | Warranty: 10 years What you’ll love: Balanced bed feel suits most sleep styles, especially stomach sleepers Targeted lumbar support Specialty cooling cover Dual-coil construction is ultra-supportive Keep in mind: Mediocre extras for the cost Only comes in one firmness level With a 13.5-inch profile, an inviting pillow top and a Euro-style gusset, the Leesa Legend Chill Hybrid resembles a luxury hotel mattress, but this new addition to the Leesa lineup is more than its good looks. Its medium-firm feel accommodates multiple sleep styles, and although there’s a sumptuous pillow top you can sink into, a dual coil system of nearly 3,800 pocket springs and microcoils gives this bed plenty of support and bounce so you won’t feel stuck in it. The cover is woven with phase-change fibers that Leesa claims help maintain the ideal skin temperature for sleep. (Not to mention, all of those coils help prevent heat buildup, too.) What our experts say: Dillon says, “The Leesa Legend Chill Hybrid is one of my favorites from 3Z, the parent brand of Leesa. It’s comparable to high-end mattresses that retail for $4,000 or more. There are only a handful of beds that boast two coil layers. Combined with its comfortable foam layers and fluffy pillow top, it’s an ultra supportive and plush bed that makes you look forward to lying down.” Best Organic Cooling Mattress A Breathable Blend Of Certified Organic Latex, Wool And Cotton Avocado Green Mattress Avocado Green Mattress (Queen) Type: Hybrid | Materials: Dunlop latex, coils; optional pillow top or box top | Firmness level: Firm (7), medium (6) or plush (4) | Trial period: 365 nights | Warranty: 25-year limited What you’ll love: Available in three firmness levels Made with organic, naturally breathable materials Also a good choice for sleepers with airborne allergies Keep in mind: Pillow top and box top upgrades are pricey It’s a heavy mattress, with no in-room delivery available Organic mattresses swap synthetic foams for latex foam, a naturally breathable material that’s just as pressure-relieving as memory foam and more forgiving toward sleepers with allergies. Our top eco-friendly choice for hot sleepers is the Avocado Green Mattress, which features a layer of Global Organic Latex Standard (GOLS)-certified Dunlop latex, over 1,400 pocketed support coils and a top cover woven with 100% organic cotton and wool fibers for breezy, supportive sleep. It’s earned a myriad of mattress certifications, including a seal of approval from the American Chiropractic Association for its 5-zoned ergonomic design to promote proper spinal alignment. The mattress has a firm feel (7 out of 10), but for sleepers who crave a plusher surface you can add a pillow top or a box top for an extra fee. Avocado offers a year-long trial period for you to test it out at home so you can experience how well it regulates temperature even as the seasons change. What our experts say: Contributor Jamie Ueda notes in her Avocado Green Mattress review that the breathable, temperature-regulating combo of cotton, wool and latex should help keep sleepers comfortable. “I noticed that if I lay in one spot for a period of time, some heat built up, but I didn’t get overly hot. When I moved, the heat quickly dissipated. I slept well through the night and didn’t wake up because I was too hot or cold.” Best Cooling Hybrid Mattress Purple's GelFlex Grid Delivers Cooling And Pressure Relief Purple Purple RestorePremier Hybrid (Queen) Type: Hybrid | Materials: Coils, GelFlex Grid and foam | Firmness level: Soft or firm | Trial period: 100 nights | Warranty: 10 years What you’ll love: Two firmness levels to choose from Coils and GelFlex Grid keep the air flowing Bouncy yet limits movement well Keep in mind: May not be supportive enough for front sleepers Hybrid mattresses are typically more breathable than their all-foam counterparts because of their coils, which help prevent heat from becoming trapped. The Purple RestorePremier Hybrid ups the ante by pairing its CoolFlex support coils with Purple’s proprietary GelFlex Grid for ample airflow, cushioned pressure relief and targeted support. It’s topped by a moisture-wicking SoftFlex cover with an antimicrobial finish for hygienic sleep. You find some foam here, as well — there’s edge support foam along the perimeter and a support layer of foam to serve as a foundation for the GelFlex Grid. Choose between a soft or firm comfort level; we recommend the soft version for side or back sleepers who like to sink into their beds a little deeper. What our experts say: Executive editor Dave Johnson claims in his Purple PremierRestore Hybrid Mattress Review, “When I went out of town for the holidays in the middle of testing, I was eager to get back home and continue sleeping on the RestorePremier. My partner concurred; it was excellent at providing support, motion isolation and ease of movement, while still delivering a superbly comfortable, soft and cushy feel. It even delivered great temperature control, keeping me cool throughout the night.” Best Cooling Mattress For Back Pain A Luxury Innerspring To Melt Away Your Aches Saatva Saatva Classic (Queen) Type: Innerspring hybrid | Materials: Pocketed coils, micro coils and memory foam | Firmness level: Plush soft (3), luxury firm (5 to 7) or firm (8) | Trial period: 365 nights | Warranty: Lifetime What you’ll love: Customizable firmness and depth Variety of firmness levels to choose from Free white glove delivery Keep in mind: Lacks foam so you won’t sink much here Costs $99 to send it back Suffering from a double-whammy of back pain and hot flashes? The Saatva Classic provides you with the salvation you need. This luxury innerspring hybrid boasts a dual layer of coils that cradles your body and keeps the air flowing. On top is a lush 3-inch Euro pillow top wrapped in an organic cotton cover to wick away heat and moisture. Specialty quilting, reinforced springs and a strip of gel-infused memory foam in the center of the mattress keep you well-aligned while melting away your backache. Surrounding the perimeter are dense foam rails for edge support. With three firmness levels (plush soft, luxury firm or firm) and two height profiles (11.5 inches or 14.5 inches), you can tailor the Saatva Classic to your liking. A 365-night trial allows you to test the mattress and ensure its temperature regulation is up to par, no matter the season. Free in-home delivery and mattress removal spares your back from further strain. What our experts say: Our former editor was a fan of her luxury firm Saatva Classic. As she says in her Saatva Classic Mattress review, “The temperature regulation of the Saatva Classic is absolutely top-notch. The only other option that might be able to come close in terms of cooling are all-latex mattresses. But when compared to other innerspring and memory foam options I’ve tested, the Saatva Classic is in a league of its own. If you’re a hot sleeper, I think this mattress is a great choice.” Best Cooling Mattress For Couples A Cool, Plush-Topped Mattress That Prevents Motion Transfer DreamCloud The DreamCloud (Queen) Type: Hybrid | Materials: Foam, wrapped coils | Firmness level: Luxury firm (6.5) | Trial period: 365 nights | Warranty: Lifetime What you’ll love: Cashmere-blend cover is luxe and comfy For a hybrid, it does an excellent job of limiting movement A great choice for back, stomach and combination sleepers Keep in mind: Feels firmer than advertised A little too firm for strict side sleepers For those who like to sleep cool, sharing a bed with another 98.6-degree individual isn’t ideal. But before going old school with two twin beds, take a look at the DreamCloud. A layer of coils helps promote airflow, while a gel memory foam layer, along with a quilted cashmere-blend cover, works to wick away heat. To keep your partner’s fidgeting and fussing from waking you up, the DreamCloud’s individually wrapped springs and multiple foam layers effectively dampen movement so you and your partner don’t wake each other up. Best of all, this luxury hybrid is constantly on sale. Combined with a year-long trial and a lifetime warranty, the DreamCloud is one of our favorite affordable mattress values. What our experts say: Alison Barretta, contributor and co-author of this story, says, “I sleep alone but performing multiple drop tests with a weight and an empty wine glass revealed how well the DreamCloud absorbs motion. The glass hardly moved, no matter how close I dropped the weight. I’m also prone to sleeping warm, but, like other members of my testing panel who tried the DreamCloud, I didn’t ever wake up sweaty on this mattress.” Best Cooling Memory Foam Mattress A Comfy Foam Pick Packed With Cooling Tech GhostBed GhostBed Luxe (Queen) Type: Memory foam | Materials: Gel-infused foam, phase-change materials | Firmness level: Medium to medium-firm| Trial period: 101 nights | Warranty: 25 years What you’ll love: Multiple cooling features including phase-change materials and gel-infused foam Medium feel ideal for side, back and combination sleepers Generous 25-year limited warranty Keep in mind: May be too soft for stomach sleepers Heavy sleepers over 250 pounds may want a hybrid The Ghostbed Luxe is Ghostbed’s most popular mattress, touted on their website as “The Coolest Bed In the World.” Although it’s made of memory foam and lacks the breathability of an innerspring, hybrid or latex bed, the Ghostbed Luxe is packed with cooling features that assist with temperature regulation. The outer layers of the bed consist of a cooling cover made with temperature-regulating fibers and a layer of gel memory foam, which helps to pull heat away from your body. Beneath the cover is a “Ghost Ice” layer, which is made of phase change material that can absorb heat and dissipate it away from your body and the base of the mattress. This helps keep the mattress from warming up throughout the night. Additionally, Ghostbed offers a 25-year limited warranty on this mattress, which is rare for a foam bed and speaks to its durability. What the reviews say: One reviewer writes, “We were surprised at the structure of this mattress and how much support it gives. No sinking like an old school memory foam mattress.” Another says, “While I wouldn’t say this is the coolest mattress in the world, because it’s all foam that would be a tough feat, I can say it’s by far the coolest memory foam mattress I’ve owned.” Best Luxury Cooling Mattress A Smart Bed That Reacts To Your Body Temperature Sleep Number Sleep Number Climate360 (Queen) Type: Hybrid | Materials: Foam, wrapped coils, thermal layer and microsensors | Firmness level: Adjustable | Trial period: 100 nights | Warranty: 15 years What you’ll love: Dual climate controls and firmness settings Feature-rich adjustable smart base included Tracks your sleep so you can identify trends Accommodates all sleeping positions Keep in mind: Expensive, even when it’s on sale Requires Wi-Fi to run effectively Sleep Number makes some of the most feature-rich luxury mattresses on the market. According to the brand, its Climate360 smart mattress is the only bed of its kind in the world since it actively cools and warms in response to your body temperature. Better yet, there are dual climate controls and adjustable firmness levels—if you and your partner have different preferences, this allows you to sleep in the same bed in peace. Built into the Climate360 are discreet microsensors that track your key vitals (heart rate, movement and sleep cycles) to deliver a Sleep Score, which you can pull up in the Sleep Number companion app. You can use this data to hack your sleep and create better habits. What our experts say: In her Sleep Number Climate360 Review, sleep editor McKenzie Dillon says, “Hot and cold sleepers should really enjoy this bed, especially if your needs are different than your partner’s. The cooling function is unlike anything I’ve seen on another mattress, and I found it to be very effective in my testing. The same goes for the warming feature.” As for its adjustable firmness, she adds, “The left and right side of the bed function independently of one another, giving you and your partner the ability to customize each side with the firmness levels you prefer.” Tempur-Pedic Promo Codes | 30% Off In April 2024 Best Affordable Cooling Memory Foam Mattress Snag A Queen Mattress Plus Free Bedding For Under $700 Cocoon by Sealy Cocoon Chill Mattress (Queen) Type: Foam (also available as a hybrid) | Materials: Cooling cover, foam and coils (hybrid) | Firmness level: Medium (6) | Trial period: 100 nights | Warranty: 10 years What you’ll love: Cooling comfort at an affordable price Ideal for side, back and combination sleepers Keep in mind: For cooler sleep, choose the hybrid May be too firm for some side sleepers The Cocoon Chill from Sealy is one of the best mattresses under $1,000—especially when you consider how pricey specialty cooling mattresses can be. Temperature regulation is aided in large part by a top cover woven with phase change materials (PCM) that are designed to draw away heat and wick away moisture, according to the company. But it doesn’t stop there—the mattress also contains a layer of breathable “Perfect Fit” memory foam that contours your body without leaving you stifled. If you want a bit more bounce and even better airflow, a hybrid version is available, as well (and yes, it’s still affordable). A perpetual 35% off sale keeps the Cocoon Chill firmly in the budget bracket, and if that weren’t enough it comes with a free bedding bundle of sheets and pillows, too. What our experts say: Barretta says, “Although the cover isn’t cool to the touch as advertised, the Cocoon Chill still did a respectable job of keeping me comfortable. Even when I battled a brief fever, I didn’t wake up terribly hot and sticky. If you want more enhanced temperature regulation, I’d suggest opting for the hybrid version—but for most people, the base-level Cocoon Chill mattress gets the job done.” Best Firm Cooling Mattress The Coolest Tempur-Pedic Mattress Ever Made Tempur-Pedic Tempur-Breeze LuxeBreeze (Queen) Type: Foam or hybrid | Materials: Tempur Material, cooling cover and coils (hybrid) | Firmness level: Soft, medium hybrid or firm |Trial period: 90 nights | Warranty: 10 years What you’ll love: Machine-washable cover for easy upkeep Virtually no motion transfer Comes with free in-home delivery Multiple firmness options to pick from Keep in mind: Tempur Material causes resistance to movement Underwhelming extras for the exorbitant cost Firm mattresses are sought after for their incredible support but they’re also less likely to make you overheat since you don’t sink into the surface but instead feel like you're lying right on top of it. Add the cooling properties of the Tempur-Breeze LuxeBreeze and you'll hardly break a sweat. Available in firm, soft or a medium hybrid, the LuxeBreeze delivers Tempur Material's signature pressure relief minus the typical heat buildup. It has specially-engineered foams that absorb body heat plus a top cover that’s soothing to the touch and removable for easy laundering. Tempur Material also excels at limiting motion transfer so if you share a bed, your partner’s movements won’t disturb your sleep. What our experts say: Dillon says, “When you buy a Tempur-Pedic Mattress, it’s probably for its pressure relieving, conforming feel you’ve come to love about the brand’s memory foam. The Breeze offers that signature Tempur-Pedic feel with a temperature-regulating design and physically cool cover. I also appreciate how it offers different firmness options that appeal to a wide range of sleeping positions.” Best Cooling Mattress For Pressure Relief A Supportive Hybrid That Cradles And Cools Casper Casper Snow (Queen) Type: Hybrid | Materials: Phase change materials, aluminum graphite bands and memory foam | Firmness level: Medium (5 to 6) | Trial period: 100 nights | Warranty: 10 years What you’ll love: Phase-change materials and graphite bands dissipate heat Medium feel accommodates side, back and combination sleepers Zoned foam promotes relief and spinal alignment Keep in mind: Only available in one firmness level Some reviewers say the cooling effects are minimal The Casper Snow stays true to its name and is specifically designed to help hot sleepers stay cool. According to the Casper website, it can help you sleep up to five degrees cooler. This is thanks to several cooling features, including the Snow cover made with cooling fibers and a layer of phase-change material that helps pull heat away from your body. It also features three “Heat Delete” bands composed of aluminum graphite that help dissipate heat, and the coils allow for improved airflow and breathability compared to all-foam models. Additionally, the hybrid construction combines the support and structure of pocketed coils with conforming, zoned memory foam that boasts a medium profile—resulting in a cooling mattress that’s also ideal for relieving pressure points. It’s soft enough to provide ample give under the hips and shoulders but doesn’t compromise on support. What the reviews say: One happy review says, “I’m a side sleeper and this mattress has taken the pressure off my shoulder and neck.” Another says, “The mattress seems to pull the heat away from your body. Solid support where you need it, and you can move around without waking up your sleep partner.” MORE FROMFORBES VETTED I Went Hands-On With Samsung’s New Flip 6 And Fold 6–And One Wowed Me By Rebecca Isaacs Forbes Staff The Best Cooling Mattress Protectors That Also Protect Against Wetness By SaVanna Shoemaker Contributor Why Trust Forbes Vetted We have a growing library of mattress guides built upon the knowledge of sleep experts, hands-on testing and hours of thorough research. Senior mattress and sleep editor Bridget Chapman and mattress and sleep editor McKenzie Dillon are certified sleep science coaches who have tested over 100 beds and know exactly what mattress features and qualities best suit hot sleepers. Senior strategy editor Katie Simpson, sleep updates writer Alexandra Garrett and contributor and mattress tester Alison Barretta, refresh this story regularly to reevaluate our top picks and offer the latest shopping advice. Forbes vetted contributor SaVanna Shoemaker last updated this article in July 2024, adding additional information in the shopping guide. She also added the Casper Snow mattress to the rankings, and replaced the Nectar Premier Mattress with the GhostBed Luxe as the best memory foam option. How We Chose The Best Cooling Mattresses To create this list, we first evaluated which mattresses from highly regarded brands offer cooling features for hot sleepers. We then put many of these mattresses to the test (often in our own homes), paying special attention to the mattress’s construction and any additional cooling features (like gel-infused foams or specialty covers). Beds made with a coil base took priority since this type of design tends to sleep the coolest, although there are some all-foam options on this list if that’s your preference. Each bed also had to offer a trial period with a seamless return policy and exceptional customer reviews, particularly from habitually hot sleepers. Of course, cooling ability played a substantial role in making our selections. However, we also considered other essential benefits—for example, pressure relief, support along key areas and low motion transfer for co-sleepers who share a bed with a fidgety partner. What To Consider When Buying A Cooling Mattress Since waking up hot is a common issue, many top mattress brands have worked to redesign their beds for increased breathability and temperature regulation. Here’s what you should look for when buying a cooling mattress. Mattress Type And Construction Mattresses come in many different constructions, the four most common being: hybrid, innerspring, latex and memory foam. Each of these mattress types offers a different combination of support, comfort and cooling abilities. Innerspring mattresses promote the most airflow out of any other type due to the empty spaces between the coils. These beds also tend to be more supportive, bouncy and firm than other mattress types. Hybrid mattresses typically have a breathable coil base with comfort layers on top. This results in a best-of-both-worlds mattress construction where you can enjoy the added comfort of memory foam without the heat-trapping effects. Some hybrid beds use gel- or copper-infused foams, which enhance the bed’s cooling abilities. Latex mattresses retain less heat than memory foam beds due to the naturally breathable structure. Natural latex such as Dunlop and Talalay is also usually aerated, which promotes a ton of airflow and breathability. Memory foam mattresses provide a marshmallowy feel that hugs your body. While this level of contouring is great for pressure relief, it often leaves sleepers feeling hot since the material retains heat. If you sleep hot but love the feel of an all-foam bed, some elements to look for are ventilated foam, foam infused with gel or copper (which help break up heat retention), and covers woven with breathable fibers or phase change materials. That said, a cooling memory foam usually still sleeps warmer than a hybrid, latex or innerspring mattress. So if sleeping cool is a top concern of yours, we recommend opting for a more breathable mattress type when possible. Additional Cooling Features Some mattresses come with additional cooling features, such as a cool-to-the-touch cover, a cooling pillow top or layers of gel or copper-infused foams. These features can either enhance a bed’s already-breathable construction or help a mattress that usually sleeps more warm (like a memory foam bed) sleep cooler instead. Here are a few added cooling features you may expect to see in these mattresses: “Cool-to-the-touch” textiles: Phase-change materials (PCM) can be used to create materials that feel cool against the skin. These are used in the covers and layers of cooling mattresses or offered as optional upgrades. Gel-infused foam: Gel-infused foams are a common feature in cooling mattresses, as the gel helps absorb body heat and dissipate it. However, one drawback is that gel infusions can lose their cooling properties over time. Air channels: Mattresses that include air channels, like hybrid or innerspring mattresses and mattresses made with perforated latex, are naturally more breathable than memory or poly foam beds. Copper or graphite: You may also see other additions, like copper or graphite, in cooling mattresses. Copper and graphite are conductors of heat, and can draw body heat away from your body for a more comfortable rest. Firmness Firmness is important whether you’re looking for a cooling mattress or not, but it also plays a role in how warm or cool a bed feels. The softer a bed is, the more you sink into it, which means your body retains more heat. Firmer beds, by contrast, tend to seem cooler since you’re on top of the mattress, not in it. Medium-firm picks hit the sweet spot of both for a comfortable, supportive feel. External Factors Your mattress alone won’t dictate how hot you sleep. The sheets you dress your mattress in, the pajamas you wear and the overall environment of your bedroom also impact your sleep temperature. (Look for breathable, moisture-wicking materials like cotton, linen or bamboo viscose.) Keep an eye on the thermostat, too. Ideally, your bedroom temperature should be anywhere from the low 60s to the high 60s. If you share a bed with a partner or your pets, you’ll naturally sleep warmer than you do solo. Other factors that may contribute to overheating at night include certain medications, health conditions, diet, late-night alcohol consumption and exercising too close to bedtime. Body Type You want to consider your body type when shopping for a new cooling mattress. Larger people may sink into softer mattresses—which can lead to excess heat. In general, the more you weigh, the softer a bed feels. If you have a larger body, you may want to consider a mattress that’s on the firmer side to help prevent this. Many of the best mattresses for heavy people have built-in cooling features and are made to accommodate more weight. They also last longer than mattresses designed for petite to average-sized people. Sleeping Position Back and stomach sleepers, in particular, may want to choose a firmer mattress to prevent their body from sinking into the bed and promote proper spinal alignment. Side sleepers should consider a softer cooling mattress that offers ample cushion underneath the shoulder and hip pressure points. Cooling Tips For Hot Sleepers A cooling mattress can do wonders for your sleep quality, but there are other cooling sleep products you can use to ensure you don’t furiously kick your covers off in a heated rage every night. Maintain A Cool, Dark Environment With Blackout Curtains Amazon Sun Zero Nordic 2-Pack Theater Grade Blackout Grommet Blackout curtains not only block light, but they can also keep your bedroom several degrees cooler by keeping the heat out. They’re particularly useful for summertime when the days are longer and hotter. These blackout panels from Amazon come in a wide range of colors and sizes. Invest In Breathable Bedding Sleep Number Sleep Number True Temp Sheet Set (Queen) When it comes to bedding, look for breathable materials like cotton, linen and bamboo viscose. Alternatively, you can opt for specialty cooling sheets. This set from Sleep Number has volcanic minerals embedded into the fabric to regulate your body temperature so you’re not too hot or cold. Don't Forget About Your Pajamas Cozy Earth Cozy Earth Short Sleeve Bamboo Pajama Set Upgrade your old sweats-and-tee combo with a pair of lightweight, breathable pajamas. This 2-piece set from Cozy Earth is made from stretch-knit bamboo viscose, which is known for its moisture-wicking properties. (Alternatively, you can sleep in the nude to prevent yourself from overheating at night—just be mindful of the risks.) Add A Cooling Mattress Topper Amazon Pure Green 100% Natural Latex Mattress Topper (2-Inch Queen) If your mattress sleeps too warm but is otherwise in fine shape, a mattress topper can be a quick fix solution to ward those night sweats away. This natural latex topper from Pure Green has ventilation holes to aid airflow and comes in a broad range of height and size options. (Bonus: latex is one of the most durable and breathable materials you can sleep on.) What Mattress Types Sleep Cool At Night? Hybrid mattresses and innerspring mattresses sleep coolest at night. Because they have a layer of pocketed coils or springs, air flows through them more freely instead of getting trapped in the layers. Are Cooling Mattresses Worth It? Yes, it’s safe to say the cooling mattresses that work are worth the money. These mattresses incorporate phase change materials (PCM) that absorb and dissipate body heat so it doesn’t get trapped in the mattress like with traditional memory foam. They also have moisture-wicking, breathable covers that prevent night sweats and overheating. What Type Of Mattress Is The Coolest? Mattresses can have several features that distinguish them as “cooling.” A few notable features to look for include innerspring construction, cooling or moisture-wicking covers made from phase change materials, air channels built in to support air circulation and gel infusions to help reduce the bed's temperature. More Mattress And Bedding Stories To Shop The Best Linen Sheets For Sweat-Free Sleep Eight Sleep Pod 3 Review The Best Tempur-Pedic Mattress Alternatives
news.summary: Say goodbye to night sweats with the best cooling mattresses that regulate temperature and promote airflow. Check out our top picks, including beds from Helix and Saatva.
news.author: Forbes Staff,Karen Tietjen

news.title: Best Gifts For Men 2024 - Forbes Vetted
news.text: Share to Facebook Share to Twitter Share to Linkedin Gift-giving is a fine art, a delicate dance and a talent that only some possess, so if you’re stumped while shopping for the special guy in your life, you’re not alone. The best gifts for men, in particular, are personal, practical presents that speak to their hobbies and interests. So if you’re on the hunt for a memorable birthday gift, anniversary present or simply getting a head start on the holiday season, you’ll want to choose something that will become a staple item in his routine and shows just how well you know him. From sleek tech finds to sporty sneakers and pickleball paddles, here are the best gifts for men ... [+] that will delight for any occasion. James Ransom For Forbes; Herkisi/iStock Whether you have a busy outdoorsman on your hands (the type that could certainly use a self-cleaning water bottle), a sports-obsessed father-in-law or a brother that says he doesn’t “need” anything, we have tons of thoughtful suggestions below. From a handy wireless charger for the guy who is always low battery to a heated neck massager to help him unwind to tools that will inspire him to whip up bartender-style drinks or pizza in his own wood-burning oven, here are 70 of the very best gifts for men that are sure to be a hit for any occasion. MORE FROMFORBES VETTED I Went Hands-On With Samsung’s New Flip 6 And Fold 6–And One Wowed Me By Rebecca Isaacs Forbes Staff The Best Cooling Mattress Protectors That Also Protect Against Wetness By SaVanna Shoemaker Contributor Best Gifts For Men, At A Glance Best Gift For Men Overall: On Cloud 5 Shoes Best Self-Care Gift For Men: Mo Cuishle Neck Massager Best Fashion Gift For Men: Vuori Sunday Element Jacket Best Luxury Gift For Men: Calpak Ambeur 3-Piece Luggage Set Best Food Gift For Men: Shake Shack ShackBurger Kit Best Tech Gift For Men: Courant Catch:2 Wireless Charger Best Value Gift For Men: Joyoldelf Black Foil Playing Cards Best Practical Gift For Men: Philips Norelco Multigroom Series 9000 Best Last-Minute Gift For Men: Stanley IceFlow Stainless Steel Tumbler Best Unique Gift For Men: Vinebox Wine Subscription Best Personalized Gift For Men: Mark & Graham Leather Tie Case Best Gifts For Men Overall A Top-Rated Shoe For On And Off The Track On Running On Cloud 5 Shoes Named our best overall walking shoe for men, the On Cloud 5 sneaker is made with science-backed CloudTec foam, a forgiving material with a cushioned feel that has been described as “running on clouds.” It features a removable cushioned arch insole, plus a Speedboard running the length of the sneaker that promotes stability and propulsion when walking to help make every mile more comfortable. A Charcuterie Board Brimming With Tasty Snacks Boarderie Boarderie Ciccetti Cheese & Charcuterie Board We all know at least one guy who fills up on appetizers before the main course. If you’re shopping for him, we strongly recommend ordering one of Boarderie’s pre-packaged charcuterie boards. Artfully arranged with all of the meats, cheeses and treats (dried fruit, olives, chocolates and more) to fulfill their wildest snacking dreams, it’s sealed for freshness and can last up to ten days in the fridge. A Timeless Designer Wallet Neiman Marcus Saint Laurent Men's Logo Leather Bifold Wallet If his wallet has seen better days, now’s the time for an upgrade. This streamlined bifold style by Saint Laurent is made with oh-so-smooth calf leather and will look sleek whenever he pulls it out. The two slip pockets and four card slots will help keep him organized. A Self-Cleaning Water Bottle LARQ Larq Bottle PureVis LARQ uses UV-C LED light to eliminate up to 99.9% of bio-contaminants from your water and bottle. The double-wall vacuum insulation keeps liquids cold for 24 hours and hot for 12, making this the water bottle of choice among the well hydrated. A Shrink-Free Hoodie Todd Snyder Todd Snyder + Champion Popover Hoodie Stylish menswear brand Todd Snyder teamed up with Champion to release this beloved hoodie, which is specially knit to resist shrinkage so it stays true to size and gets better with time. It comes in eight cool colors, including this soft blue hue that looks great with jeans and joggers. A Spa-Worthy Body Care Kit Huron Huron Fave Four Bundle Who wouldn’t love a vegan, cruelty-free bundle that makes you feel good and smell even better? Great for both the man who goes all out with grooming and the one who needs some inspiration, this body care set by Huron includes a shampoo, conditioner, body wash and deodorant in fresh scents like eucalyptus, juniper, sandalwood and cedarwood. A Cozy Pair Of Slippers Nordstrom Ugg Tasman Slipper Everyone is happier when they’re comfortable and their toes are toasty. Make his day with a pair of Ugg’s popular shearling-lined Tasman slippers that he’ll surely keep on his side of the bed for seasons to come. From the padded foam footbed to the durable outsole, these cozy slippers are a bestseller for a reason. A Super Soft Set Of Pajamas Lunya Lunya Men's Airy Cotton Long Sleeve Pant Set For the man that runs hot at night, these luxury pajamas by Lunya will keep him cool and comfy while he snoozes. Made of lightweight and breathable poplin cotton, the design also features luxe touches like silk trim and covered buttons, so he’ll also feel quite fancy whenever he slips them on. Best Self-Care Gifts For Men A Heated Neck Massager To Help Him Unwind Amazon Mo Cuishle Neck Massager Whether he’s an athlete looking for an at-home post-workout recovery session or a traveler in need of some major relaxation, this heated shiatsu neck massager soothes and relaxes strained muscles without a spa appointment. If this isn’t the gift that keeps giving, we don’t know what is. A Handy Wearable Health Tracker Amazon Fitbit Charge 6 Fitness Tracker One of Fitbit’s most advanced wearables, the Charge 6 tracks health metrics like heart rate, activity, sleep, stress and blood oxygen levels, plus helps you optimize a personalized exercise program, all for a surprisingly modest price. It also includes six months of premium membership (and after that you pay $80 per year), which uses insight from your data to let you know if you’re ready for a workout or need to prioritize recovery, among other features. A Top-Rated Skincare Set La Roche-Posay La Roche-Posay Dry Skin Routine Set This top-rated travel skincare set from La Roche-Posay has all of the no-fuss necessities for healthy skin on the go. There’s a gentle cream cleanser, daily moisturizer and hydrating serum that he can pat on post-shave to calm any irritation, plus a broad spectrum sunscreen with SPF 60 that won’t leave him greasy. A Plush Robe For Lazy Days Cozy Earth Cozy Earth Waffle Bath Robe Everything from Cozy Earth is luxe, but this bath robe is extra snuggly. It features an absorbent waffle weave texture on the outside that’s balanced by a super-soft ribbed terry lining, which makes it the perfect thing to slip on after a warm shower. It’s also slight oversized without feeling heavy, and has an adjustable tie waist and large pockets for phones, snacks and more. A Rich Cream That Will Keep Him Bright-Eyed Dermstore Aēsop Parsley Seed Anti-Oxidant Eye Cream Whether he has a full-on nighttime skincare regimen or has been known to dip into your luxe face creams from time to time, he’ll feel all kinds of fancy when applying this Aēsop eye cream. Its antioxidant blend includes hydrating and nourishing vitamins C and E that will help him look (and feel) more refreshed. A Luxe Set Of Bath Products That Will Help Him Unwind Bloomingdales Baobab Collection Gentlemen Lotion & Hand Wash Gift Set Chances are, he’d never splurge on bath products himself. And that’s what makes this Baobab Collection gift set such a great present. It includes chic bottles of hand wash and a hand and body lotion in the Gentlemen scent, which has notes of rum, saffron and amber. If you’re looking for a housewarming gift, it’s particularly nice. A Woodsy Candle That Makes Any Room Cozy Target Threshold Amber Glass Leather And Embers Candle If he enjoys a relaxing night in, this Threshold candle will help set the scene. With a burn time of 36 hours, the masculine scent includes notes of aged leather and campfire embers—and the crackling wooden wick adds an extra cozy feel to any space. A Discovery Wardrobe Of Fine Fragrances Neiman Marcus Maison Francis Kurkdjian Fragrance Wardrobe for Him Not every guy wants to commit to one scent—and that’s okay. With this fragrance wardrobe from Maison Francis Kurkdjian, he won’t have to. From light and fresh eau de toilettes to stronger, more sophisticated scents, he can play around to find his future favorite among the eight 11ml bottles. Best Fashion Gifts For Men A Moisture-Wicking Jacket For Running Miles Or Errands Vuori Vuori Men's Sunday Element Jacket Wherever life’s adventures take him, Vuori’s Sunday Element Jacket will help him stay warm and dry. Featuring a four-way stretch performance fabric that has both moisture-wicking and anti-odor properties, it will also keep him protected without packing on a lot of weight or bulk, so he can easily wear it on the go (or stash it in a bag during travel). A Cozy New Pair Of Sweats That Go From The Couch To The Gym Champs Sports Nike Tech Fleece Joggers These joggers may feel like sweats, but the tapered leg and slim fit elevates them to a level of leave-the-house acceptability. In fact, they’re actually designed for hitting the gym with Nike’s lightweight Tech Fleece fabric that locks in just the right amount of body heat, so he’ll stay warm—but not too warm—on chillier days. Of course, they work just as well for lounging around or running errands, and the giant zip pocket can store all of his essentials. A Stylish Shirt That Blocks The Sun’s Harmful Rays Daise Daise Logan Knit Camp Shirt If he has returned from an outdoor adventure with a farmer’s tan one too many times, it’s probably a good idea to help him step up his sun-safe regimen. And you can start by introducing him to Daise’s sun-protective apparel, like this casual-cool collared shirt. It’s rated UPF 50+, meaning that it blocks 98% of the sun’s rays, and he could rock it anywhere from a barbecue to a boat day. A Lightweight Shoe That's Also Sustainable Allbirds Allbirds Tree Runner Go Sneakers White sneakers work for any season, with almost any outfit—and the recently launched Allbirds Tree Runner Go shoes put a modern spin on the classic style. Made with lightweight, breathable tree fiber, the sneakers deliver all day comfort with soft yet springy cushioning. And while they’re certainly a fashionable gift, they’re also sustainably made with at least 50% less carbon emissions and water consumption than similar fabrics. A Leather Belt That's Ethically Made Nisolo Nisolo Men's Leather Owen Belt It’s a simple fact: A guy can never have too many belts. This one from the sustainably minded brand Nisolo is made from water-resistant leather and features an elegant yet subtle brass finished buckle that will easily upgrade his wardrobe. Handmade in an ethical factory in Peru, it’s available in four neutral colors. And they’d all look great. Best Luxury Gifts For Men A Seriously Sleek Luggage Set CALPAK Calpak Ambeur 3-Piece Luggage Set Any man who frequents an airplane, whether for work or pleasure, needs a luggage set that’s anything but basic. This high-shine large suitcase, medium suitcase and matching carry-on set by Calpak is very James Bond, featuring all the bells and whistles like an expandable body, carbon steel bearing wheels, interior pockets and a built-in TSA lock. A Stylish E-Bike That Keeps Up With City Living Rad Power Bikes Rad Power Bikes Radster Road Electric Commuter Bike When was the last time you were given a bike as a gift? Elementary school, maybe? Don’t underestimate the nostalgia (and practicality) that a bike can bring on a birthday or holiday morning. Perfect for zipping through town, this electric bike by Rad Power hits top speeds of 28 miles per hour to keep up with busy schedules and reaches up to 65 miles in a single charge. A Football-Shaped Travel Kit Neiman Marcus Shinola Men's Football Leather Travel Toiletry Kit This toiletry kit from Shinola is where luxury meets novelty. Crafted from rich leather, the travel bag has a roomy interior that can easily be wiped clean—you know, when it’s not busy storing all of his travel essentials. Of course, the best part is that it’s ever so subtly shaped like a football. If the chestnut color is a bit too on the nose, it also comes in black. A Relaxing Vacation At Cancun’s Chicest Resort Nizuc NIZUC Resort & Spa In Cancun Does your favorite guy deserve some time off? If so, book him a trip to paradise—also known as NIZUC Resort & Spa in Cancun. He can unplug from the moment he sets foot on the 29-acre Mexican oasis, which is located in the secluded enclave of Punta NIZUC (it has a storied history, once serving as the ancient base of Mayan astronomers). Once there, the tropical getaway of his dreams awaits: There are two private beaches for lounging, snorkeling and water sports, multiple infinity pools and six gourmet restaurants. He’ll be thrilled by the view from his oceanfront suite or private villa, but if you really want to spoil him, surprise him with a Mayan-inspired massage at the resort’s spa by ESPA. A Cool Dog Tag Necklace John Hardy John Hardy Tag Necklace If you’re shopping for a guy with a jewelry collection that rivals your own, you’ll knock it out of the park with this John Hardy necklace. Set on a sterling silver chain, the dog tag pendant features a unique Tiger Eye gemstone (representing vitality and physical action) that will subtly jazz up any look. It also comes in black onyx, should that better suit his style. Best Food & Drink Gifts For Men The Gift Of A ShackBurger Anytime Katz's Delicatessen Shake Shack ShackBurger DIY Kit If his favorite comfort food is a juicy burger, this DIY kit from Shake Shack will have him firing up the grill upon opening. The bundle comes with everything he’ll need for eight ShackBurgers: fresh patties of Shake Shack’s custom Pat LaFrieda 100% Angus beef blend, Martin’s pillowy Potato Rolls, slices of American cheese, and of course, six ounces of the top-secret ShackSauce that he can slather on to his heart’s content. A DIY Hot Sauce Kit Food52 FarmSteady Fermented Hot Sauce Kit For those who are obsessed with hot sauce, this kit contains everything you need to whip up your own fermented batches, which combine heat with umami for extra depth. There’s a half-gallon glass jar, a fermentation weight and an airlock lid and kosher salt, plus instructions for making your secret sauce. Bonus: This bundle is also great for pickling and making sauerkraut. A Gadget That Infuses Your Food With Smoky Flavor Amazon Homia Smoking Gun Wood Smoke Infuser This highly-rated infuser by Homia adds a smoky flavor to grilled or sous vide meat, fish, vegetables, cheeses and cocktails in minutes. The portable gun delivers a cold smoke and comes with specially designed lids, a flexible hose and flavored wood chips. A Stove-Top Pan For Indoor BBQ Caraway Caraway Square Grill Pan Anyone who frequently cooks could always use another pan, but the guy who grills is going to love Caraway’s new square-shaped grilling pan. He’ll be able to barbecue all winter long, right from his kitchen thanks to this stovetop gem, which provides those satisfying sear marks on anything it cooks and requires minimal oil (and cleanup) since its non-toxic ceramic coating creates an already-slick surface. It comes in a nice range of colors, and is also sold as part of a full cookware set. A Subscription That Introduces Him To Worldly Delights Tokyo Treat Tokyo Treat Snack Box Founded by a Tokyo native who loved sharing local snacks with her friends around the world, Tokyo Treat recreates that experience on repeat with their monthly subscription service. Available in three, six and twelve month plans, each shipment comes with 15 to 20 full size snacks, including Japanese soda, instant ramen, rare KitKat flavors, chips, cake and more. A Trio Of Impeccably Designed Knives Amazon Opinel Parallel Trio Knife Set Named one of the 100 best designed objects in the world by the Victoria and Albert Museum, Opinel knives have been a kitchen essential since 1890. Any at-home chef would be thrilled to receive this three-piece set that contains a chef's knife for chopping produce, a carving knife for slicing meat and poultry and a paring knife for handling smaller foods. A Portable Wood-Burning Oven That Wows Guests Ooni USA Ooni Karu 12 Multi-Fuel Pizza Oven Give the man in your life the opportunity to channel his inner Nonna with this convertible wood-, charcoal- and gas-burning stainless steel outdoor pizza oven by Ooni. Portable enough to take camping (weighing in at only 26 pounds) and ideal for backyard pizza parties, this modern gadget gives grilling a run for its money and makes dining alfresco that much cooler. A Well-Balanced, Triple-Filtered Premium Añejo ReserveBar Flecha Azul Cristalino If his idea of the perfect drink involves tequila, then he’ll find a bottle of Flecha Azul’s Cristalino to be a true treat. The ultra-premium, additive-free spirit is rested in ex-bourbon American oak barrels for 18 months in Jalisco, Mexico, resulting in notes of vanilla, dark chocolate and subtle spice. For added cool points, it also happens to be a favorite of actor Mark Wahlberg, the principal investor in the brand created by golfer Abraham Ancer and entrepreneur Aron Marquez. Best Tech Gifts For Men A Leather-Wrapped Wireless Charging Dock COURANT Courant Catch:2 Multi-Device Wireless Charger Make the mundane task of charging accessories a design moment with this wireless charger that’s wrapped in Italian saddle leather and can hold multiple gadgets, like phones and earbuds, to quickly bring them back to 100% with five Qi-Certified coils. As an added perk, you can also monogram this pick for an additional $15. A Kindle That Will Hold His Whole Library Amazon Amazon Kindle If the man in your life is always looking for his next great read, the latest Kindle is just the gift. The lightweight tablet can store thousands of books (up to 16 GB), which is double the storage capacity of the previous model. Its battery life is impressive, too—it’ll last up to six weeks on a single charge. A Smart Toothbrush That Whitens With Every Use SNOW Snow LED Electric Teeth Whitening Toothbrush Unglamorous as it may sound, the gift of a healthy smile is worth a lot. This toothbrush from Snow isn’t your average run-of-the-mill drugstore pick, but a product that feels more like an Apple gadget. The sonic-powered bristles clean teeth and gums while built-in LED lights whiten as you brush. A Sweet Reminder That He's On Your Mind Uncommon Goods Long Distance Touch Bracelet Set If you and the man in your life are separated by distance, show him he’s never far from your mind with this set of unique touch bracelets. The silicone bands connect to an app, which activates a light and vibration prompted by one partner to let the other know that they’re thinking of them. Noise-Canceling Headphones For Work And Play Beats Beats Studio Pro Wireless Headphones Whether he wears headphones during endless Zoom meetings or to get his podcast fix, Beats has him covered. The brand’s latest version of its signature over-ear style delivers from tech specs (active noise cancellation, upgraded voice-targeting microphones and personalized spatial audio with dynamic head tracking) to sound quality. They also have up to 40 hours of battery life and come in four neutral colors. A Very Cool Smart Speaker Bowers & Wilkins Bowers & Wilkins Zeppelin McLaren Edition Wireless Speaker He doesn’t need to drive a McLaren to appreciate the automotive maker’s latest collaboration with Bowers & Wilkins. The Zeppelin McLaren Edition is a football-shaped wireless speaker that fuses the sleek design elements of the luxury super car with high-quality sound engineered for direct streaming and connected listening throughout your home. The results are as crystal-clear and top-tier as it gets. Best Value Gifts For Men Fancy Playing Cards With An Affordable Price Tag Joyoldelf Joyoldelf Black Foil Poker Playing Cards Whether he enjoys a quiet game of solitaire, a weekly poker night with his friends or needs an interesting coffee table addition, this moody deck of cards is a pleasant surprise. The black-on-black design looks cool enough to be on display in a Vegas casino, and costs less than $10, making it one of the most affordable gifts on this list. A Guitar Pick Punch That Turns Trash Into Treasure Amazon Pick-a-Palooza DIY Guitar Pick Punch This metal punch is the perfect gift for the musically-inclined man who can never keep track of his tools. He can create unique picks from any source of plastic—old IDs, subway cards, credit cards—so he’ll be ready the next time he prepares to pluck away at a gig or at-home jam session. Ice Molds That Upgrade Your Drink Presentation Williams Sonoma Williams Sonoma Sphere Ice Molds (Set Of 2) Sure, you could just put regular ice in your drinks. But unlike standard cubes, larger ice spheres melt slowly to evenly chill your beverage, which makes them a bartender favorite. These silicone molds from Williams Sonoma make the perfect two-inch diameter sphere every time. A Portable Food Warmer For Hot Meals On The Go Amazon Crock-Pot Electric Lunch Box Whether he packs his lunch for work every day or he’s known to meal prep for weekend outings, this electric lunch box from Crock-Pot ensures his meal will be ready when he is. The spill-proof design and packable size makes it convenient to heat up dishes like soup or oatmeal, plus the detachable cord ensures he can keep leftovers toasty on the go. A Book That Will Keep Him Intrigued Amazon The Book Of Unusual Knowledge This totally unique book will live permanently on the coffee table of any trivia buff. With over 20 chapters themed around topics like movies and television, American landmarks, pop culture, animals, science and more, The Book Of Unusual Knowledge provides hours of fascinating reading, from useful tidbits to obscure facts. An All-In-One Nail Kit Amazon Stainless Steel Manicure Kit From cuticle trimmers to nail files and clippers, this all-in-one stainless steel nail set includes everything he’ll need to look his best from his fingers up. The rugged leather case keeps everything organized and will fit right into his gym bag, work tote or nightstand. A Special Bottle Of Bourbon With An Artsy Twist Great Jones Great Jones x Jean-Michel Basquiat Empire Edition Straight Bourbon For the guy who appreciates artwork and kicking back with a nice glass of whiskey, look no further than this expression from Great Jones Distilling Co. The whiskey distillery—which is the first and only of its kind in Manhattan since Prohibition—has exclusive art deco-inspired bottles of straight bourbon that feature the legendary work of Jean-Michel Basquiat. It’ll bring some instant cool factor to his bar cart. Best Practical Gifts For Men A High-Tech Trimmer He Can Use From Head To Toe Amazon Philips Norelco Multigroom Series 9000 If it’s about time for him to swap out his old electric razor for a new one, treat him to the Philips Norelco All-in-One Trimmer 9000. It features smart technology that scans beard density and boosts power just where it’s needed, has self-sharpening steel blades and includes precision trimming guards. Best of all, there are 21 tools and accessories in the kit that will cover his grooming needs from head to toe. A Performance Tee That Will Be His New BFF HOUSE iD House iD Athletic Tee The truth is, he doesn’t even need to be a gym regular to appreciate this House iD t-shirt. Any guy who breaks a sweat will recognize the superior combination of its breathable performance stretch fabric and cooling technology, resulting in a moisture-wicking, anti-microbial style that helps regulate body temperature (and fits just right). A Bundle Of Matching Walk Essentials Wild One Wild One Dog Harness & Leash Kit There’s nothing a pet parent loves more than a gift for their fur child, and the dog lover in your life is no different. Treat him and his canine pal to this matching walk kit from Wild One, which includes a harness, leash and bag carrier. It comes in a great range of colors, but the seasonal cocoa shade is a standout. An Upgraded Single-Serve Coffee Brewer Amazon Bruvi The Bruvi Bundle Single-Serve Coffee System Even a coffee snob will respect Bruvi’s single-serve brewing system. For starters, it comes with 20 of the brand’s unique coffee and espresso B-pods—which pack up to 40% more coffee than other pods on the market—and makes seven different kinds of beverages, including cold brew and matcha lattes. It also conveniently pairs with the Bruvi app to pre-schedule essential brews for busy mornings. A Heated Back-Stretching Mat Homedics Homedics Body Flex Back Stretching Mat With Heat Whether he’s looking to unwind after a long day, recover from an intense workout or twist and flow after sitting for one hour too many, the Homedics heated back-stretching mat will offer some much-needed relief. All he has to do is lie down and select one of six yoga-style programs, all of which will move him through a series of stretches using precision-controlled air chambers. Best Last-Minute Gifts For Men A Leakproof Tumbler To Keep Him Hydrated Amazon Stanley IceFlow Stainless Steel Tumbler Keep the man on your list hydrated and happy with a Stanley IceFlow Stainless Steel Tumbler that will keep his drink icy cold on the hottest of days. The double-wall vacuum insulation is also wonderfully leakproof, which means he can throw it in his bag or the back seat without worry. A Sleek Blender For Whipping Up Smoothies Amazon Nutribullet Ultra Personal Blender If the man in your life likes buying fancy blended drinks—protein smoothies or açaí concoctions—Nutribullet’s smart gadget will allow him to recreate his favorite recipes at home in 30 seconds flat, no trip to the juice bar required. The brand’s most powerful (and quietest) single-serve machine yet, the Ultra Personal Blender features two blending modes and an intuitive touch interface, along with dishwasher-safe cups made from sustainably sourced materials. A Book That Celebrates A Photography Legend Abrams Slim Aarons: The Essential Collection A coffee table book is always a classy gift. If your guy appreciates photography, he’ll undoubtedly want to put Slim Aarons: The Essential Collection on display, stat. A comprehensive look at Aarons’ legendary career, it features more than 100 previously unpublished images and includes commentary from those closest to the icon. Fresh Crab Delivered To Your Door Goldbelly Joe's Stone Crab Dinner If he has a specific food craving from home or can’t get a specific meal from a recent trip out of his mind, Goldbelly makes it easy to get the best dishes from world-famous restaurants delivered to his front door within days. This dinner from Miami-based Joe’s Stone Crab comes with fresh crab claws, one side of your choice, a key lime pie and Joe’s signature mustard sauce, plus bibs and cocktail forks. A Handsome Timepiece He Can Always Rely On Nordstrom Movado Heritage Silhouette Leather Strap Watch Whether he’s always late or five minutes early, a quality watch will help keep him on schedule and add a little polish to his look. This 40mm Movado style has a sapphire crystal face with goldtone plating and a classic leather band that makes it an excellent wear for years to come. Best Unique Gifts For Men A Monthly Wine Tasting Subscription Vinebox Vinebox Monthly Wine Subscription His vino expertise could be sommelier level or novice; either way, he’s bound to get excited about a Vinebox wine tasting subscription. Each delivery has a surprise theme and is filled with six 100ml glass tubes of curated blends from around the globe, plus pairing recommendations, of course. Choose from a monthly, three-month or six-month subscription. A Candle Reminiscent Of A Recent Vacation Uncommon Goods National Park Candle Do you share a favorite place with the outdoorsman on your list? Gift him a hand-poured soy candle inspired by a national park. Choose from locales like the Grand Canyon, Yellowstone or Zion that each evoke an aromatic profile reminiscent of the park’s unique atmosphere. And since scent can spark memories, he’ll think of you whenever he lights it. A Personalized Golf Notebook For Keeping Track Of His Scores Smythson Smythson Golf Notes Panama Notebook He’ll feel like a million bucks when he steps onto the golf course with Smythson’s crossgrain leather pocket notebook. Lightweight but sturdy, it’s the perfect spot for him to jot down those ever-important scores come tee time. For a more personal touch, you can even have it engraved with his initials. A true win, all around. A Colorful Pickleball Set To Hit The Court In Style Nettie Nettie Double Pickleball Set If he’s been wanting to try his hand at pickleball, the nation’s fastest growing sport, he’ll be thrilled to unbox this colorful set from Nettie. It includes two USA Pickleball approved paddles, two premium balls and two retro-inspired striped sweatbands so he can hit the court in style. All he’ll have to do is find a friend who’s up to the challenge. A Sleek Cocktail Shaker For Mixing His Favorite Drinks Ralph Lauren Ralph Lauren Home Wyatt Cocktail Shaker Upgrade his bartending game with this polished cocktail shaker from Ralph Lauren. He’ll feel like a pro no matter what drink he’s mixing, thanks to its champagne gold finish and luxe navy leather details. It’s an elegant addition to any home bar. A Wine Pairing Guide That Doubles As A Kitchen Towel Uncommon Goods Stuart Gardiner Wine Pairing Towel Set These aren’t your grandmother’s kitchen towels. Featuring red and white wine guides, each guide covers 68 wines with ratings (excellent, good or best avoided), paired with 56 foods for a total of 3,808 possible combinations. He'll also find information on acidity, body, tannins and sweetness for each blend listed, perfect for wine newbies and seasoned sippers alike. An Annual Subscription To Mountain Gazette Mountain Gazette Mountain Gazette Annual Subscription Mountain Gazette has been telling captivating stories, alongside stunning photography and insightful commentary about the outdoor world for decades. Printed on massive sheets of 11-by-17-inch paper, it's your everyday magazine on steroids, akin to a coffee table book that he’ll want to devour and then proudly display. Best Personalized Gifts For Men A Custom Case For His Neckties Mark & Graham Mark & Graham Leather Tie Case A frequent traveler probably already has his favorite suitcase, custom luggage tags and plenty of packing cubes, but you can still level up his flying game with this zippered tie case from Mark & Graham that fits up to three ties, cufflinks, collar stays and handkerchiefs. You can also personalize it with his monogram for an additional $12. A Yummy Dessert That Brings Good Fortune Uncommon Goods A Dozen Custom Gourmet Fortune Cookies Settle a sweet tooth and seal his fate with a dozen handmade chocolate-drizzled fortune cookies packaged in a cute takeout container. You can choose from 80 different fortune messages, which means you can easily tailor the gift to a partner, co-worker or friend, depending on the occasion. Monogrammed Handkerchiefs In Fun Patterns Mark & Graham Mark & Graham Patterned Handkerchief, Set Of 2 A gentleman always carries a handkerchief and these monogrammed squares are as proper as it gets. Shop three color combinations and personalize them with your loved one’s initials, choosing from a variety of fonts, motifs and thread colors. A History Book On His Favorite Hockey Team Uncommon Goods Personalized NHL History Book If he loves hockey, he’ll love this personalized book that retraces significant moments of his favorite National Hockey League team. Bound with vegan leather and housing reprinted coverage from various newspapers, this book inscribed with his name on the cover is sure to live in his personal library for life. The Ultimate Cocktail Rimmer Uncommon Goods Personalized Home Bar Rimming Board Whether he’s a mixologist by trade or a host at heart, this cocktail rimming board is sure to up his drink-making game. Personalized with his name on the attached cutting board, he’ll surely keep this tool on his kitchen counter, home bar or rolling cart when he’s hosting friends or just treating himself to a nightcap. More Gifts For Men To Shop Best Subscription Boxes For Men Best Camping Gifts Best Sports Gifts Best Golf Gifts Best Tech Gifts
news.summary: The best gifts for men pair practicality with style. Shop our top picks for 2024, which include highly-rated grooming kits, genius self-cleaning water bottles and more.

news.title: Olivia Munn and John Mulaney Are Married! Inside Their Intimate Wedding Ceremony in New York (Exclusive)
news.text: Olivia Munn and John Mulaney are married! The actress, 44, and the Saturday Night Live alum, 41, who are parents to 2-year-old son Malcolm Hiệp, recently tied the knot, PEOPLE confirms. The couple got married over the weekend in a simple, intimate ceremony at a friend's home in New York state, a source close to Mulaney tells PEOPLE. Only their son and a witness were in attendance. The news comes four months after Munn opened up in March about her "terrifying" breast cancer diagnosis. The X-Men: Apocalypse star was diagnosed with bilateral breast cancer in 2023 after tests revealed she had luminal B — a fast-moving, aggressive cancer — in both breasts. “You realize cancer doesn’t care who you are; it doesn’t care if you have a baby or if you don’t have time,” she told PEOPLE in April. “It comes at you, and you have no choice but to face it head-on.” Never miss a story — sign up for PEOPLE's free daily newsletter to stay up-to-date on the best of what PEOPLE has to offer​​, from celebrity news to compelling human interest stories. Munn underwent a double mastectomy followed by reconstructive surgery last fall. She had four surgeries over the span of 10 months, and in April 2024 also underwent a hysterectomy. During an interview with Vogue in May, Mulaney praised Munn's strength. “Olivia and I have been through a lot of things together in the past couple years," he told the publication. "Just side-by-side, supporting each other through anything. And as her guy, I felt both scared and protective. Even with Malcolm in her lap and me there holding her hand, she was going to be physically fighting this disease alone.” Throughout her grueling treatment and recovery, Mulaney has been by her side. “It would’ve felt like climbing an iceberg without him,” Munn told PEOPLE. “I don’t think he had a moment to himself, between being an incredibly hands-on father and going to and from the hospital— taking Malcolm to the park, putting him to nap, driving to Cedars-Sinai, hanging out with me, going home, putting Malcolm to bed, coming back to me. And he did it all happily.” The Baby J comedian also kept her smiling. “It’s the best except when you’re just out of surgery and it hurts to move or even laugh,” said Munn. “I made him leave the room a few times because he would make me laugh too hard.” Munn and Mulaney's relationship was first reported by PEOPLE in May 2021. That September, Mulaney revealed during an appearance on Late Night with Seth Meyers, that he and Munn were expecting a baby together. “In the spring, I went to Los Angeles and met and started to date a wonderful woman named Olivia," he recalled. "I got into this relationship that's been really beautiful with someone incredible. And we're having a baby together. I was nervous when I was about to say the news!" The PEOPLE Puzzler crossword is here! How quickly can you solve it? Play now! After the pregnancy reveal, a source close to the couple told PEOPLE that they were "extremely excited about the baby." The source added, "They couldn't be happier." Hosting Saturday Night Live in February 2022, Mulaney opened up about his sobriety and sweetly touched on the arrival of the couple's then 3-month-old. “Life is a lot better and happier now,” he said. “He is a pretty cool guy for someone who can’t vote.” In November 2022, the pair celebrated their son’s first birthday. "Just got back from celebrating ONE YEAR of the most joyful baby being in this world and in our lives. My son, my joy. Happiest Birthday Malcolm Hiệp! I love you so so so much," Munn captioned a set of adorable photos on Instagram of Malcolm, who was seated on Mulaney's lap and covered head to toe in cake and frosting. The following year Munn dedicated a sweet post on Instagram celebrating Mulaney in June. "We love you Dada ? Happy Father’s Day!" she wrote. Earlier this year, Mulaney showered Munn with love in his own tribute on Instagram Stories. "My son has the most incredible mommy and he knows it," Mulaney wrote. "It's the most loving and silliest relationship I've ever seen. Happy Mother's Day, Liv." The couple have spent time on the East Coast this summer as Munn shoots the upcoming Apple TV+ series Your Friends and Neighbors. Mulaney, who wrapped his live pop-up Netflix show Everybody's in L.A. in April, has continued his comedy tour. “We’re a really strong little family," Munn told PEOPLE in her April cover story. "We’re really just there for each other.”
news.summary: The 'X-Men: Apocalypse' actress and the 'Saturday Night Live' alum tied the knot in New York over the weekend, PEOPLE can confirm
news.author: Andrea Mandell,Emily Strohm,Jordan Greene
